request.description:
This request should be used by MetaEngines. It is a stateless request and can't be used for booking a flight.
It should be used ONLY with a property DeepLinkUrl, which should be landing URL for the Meta engine. This request has Basic Auth.
This request is used for adding selected flight from a metaengine to the shopping cart.

item.name: 2. Basic B2B Workflow

item.description: Usage of API for Websites which are B2B. B2B worklow is intendent only for registered employees. Every employee is part of Travel Group which has defined policies, rules and other settings.

request.description:
This reqeuest is used for searching the hotel destination.

In case we have geolocation enabled, result will return not only cities with IATA code but also other destinations which are available through GoogleAPI.

If in results you have the "PlaceId" value, please use that value instead of "Code"

This request is responsible for getting back the Hotel data.

In case that from previous "Destination Search" you had the "PlaceId" value, please pass that value otherwise pass the "HotelCityCode" value.
